alert.note: Alert for Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 31 at 5:11AM PST until January 31 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 to 35 degrees this morning, and possibly down to sub-freezing 28 to 32 degrees Wednesday morning. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Beaches, San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Lake Casitas and Ojai Valley. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 8 AM PST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Freezing temperatures can kill crops and sensitive vegetation, and harm outdoor pets and livestock. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.
